703028f-a.text:
510-512 Atlantic Ave., south side, west of Third Ave.  Capt. Myers conducted a saloon at No. 512 prior to 1900, when he removed to Sheepshead Bay.

1922.

Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.

703029f-a.text:
Atlantic Ave., north side, between Third and Fourth Aves. The view shown is a unit of the Salvation Army, at 543 Atlantic Ave.
February 4, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
